item.title: Wdf dont work..! help pleasee
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { int targetSlot = 0;

Search that, you will see some examples of CLAttack etc.
Add: CLMining

Then this (just scroll down a very tiny bit)

if (CLMining > playerLevel[playerMining]) { sendMessage("You need " + tCLMining + " " + statName[playerMining] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }

Then try your code.

[code] }
public int GetCLMining(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
if (ItemID == 14118) {
return 99;

		return 1;

                         
}[/code]

See I added this correctly and got no errors…but I tested it and if I get on a ac that only has lvl 1 skills…I still can wear the mining cape!(so at lvl 1) wdf is wrong? I really want to add it.
